fields.fieldText: Are you sure you want to create a Purchase Order?

screens.name: Hire_Add_Suppl_Sum_of_POs_w_New_PO_Exceed_Sum_PO_PREQ
screens.label: Hire Add Suppl Sum of POs w New PO Exceed Sum PO PREQ

fields.name: DTxtHireAddSupplSum_of_POs_w_New_PO_Exceed_Sum_PO_PREQ_0_0
fields.fieldText:
** Totals Exceeded **

! - The total of all pre-existing Purchase Orders is £{!var_Sum_PO_Rolled_up_POLI_Ex_VAT} and the total for Purchase Order Product Required is £{!var_Sum_PO_PREQ_TotalCost_Excl_VAT}.

With a new PO with a value of £{!HireCurrencyCost_Add_Suppl}, this exceeds the total allowed by £{!Form_Exceeds_total_PREQ_by}.

Please press Next to amend.

With a new PO with a value of £{!HireCurrencyCost}, this exceeds the total allowed by £{!Form_Exceeds_total_PREQ_by}.

Please press Next to amend.

You selected:

To date: {!SubContractTo_Date_Time_Add_Suppl}

Job specification: {!SubContractJob_Specification_Add_Suppl}

Price (Excl. VAT): £{!SubContractAgreed_Price_Excl_VAT_Add_Suppl}

Agreed by: {!SubContractAgreed_By_Add_Suppl}

To date: {!SubContractTo_Date_Time}

Price (Excl. VAT): £{!SubContractAgreed_Price_Excl_VAT}

Price (Incl. VAT): £{!FormulaSubContract_Price_With_VAT} (VAT rate: 20%)

Agreed by: {!SubContractAgreed_By}

Please press Next to continue or Back to amend.

fields.name: DisplayTxtPREQBudgetExistingPOTotal
fields.fieldText:
Current Totals for Work Order {!var_WorkOrderData.WorkOrderNumber}:

Product required for purchase orders: £{!var_Sum_PO_PREQ_TotalCost_Excl_VAT}

Purchase orders: £{!var_Sum_PO_Rolled_up_POLI_Ex_VAT}

NB: The sum of purchase orders (Excl. VAT) must not exceed the total of purchase order product required (Excl. VAT).

You have £{!Form_Remaining_to_Spend} left to spend (Excl. VAT).

fields.name: DTxtSubContractAddSupplSum_of_POs_w_New_PO_Exceed_Sum_PO_PREQ
fields.fieldText:
** Totals Exceeded **

! - The total of all pre-existing Purchase Orders is £{!var_Sum_PO_Rolled_up_POLI_Ex_VAT} and the total for Purchase Order Product Required is £{!var_Sum_PO_PREQ_TotalCost_Excl_VAT}.

With a new PO with a value of £{!SubContractAgreed_Price_Excl_VAT_Add_Suppl}, this exceeds the total allowed by £{!Form_Exceeds_total_PREQ_by}.

Please press Next to amend.

With a new PO with a value of £{!SubContractAgreed_Price_Excl_VAT}, this exceeds the total allowed by £{!Form_Exceeds_total_PREQ_by}.
